title: Karunanidhi finds fault with Pranab’s speech over Lanka reference
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana CHENNAI: Three days after a scathing attack against the UPA government for its silence on alleged war crimes in Sri Lanka, DMK chief M Karunanidhi launched another tirade against the Centre on Saturday, this time over President Pranab Mukherjee’s references to the rehabilitation process in the island nation in his address…
